timeline.bodyText: Please do not catch Exception. What Exception can occur here?

replies.bodyText:
@J-N-K see my first post on why I catch Exception. (No other Exception can be fought it seems to me)
Nevertheless as suggested I'll try to look for list of available fonts in the hope that that will solve the issue this user is having ( which may be openjdk issue as well)
